definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: For the study, published in the September issue of Pediatrics, researchers identified 28 babies who spent time in the NICU and were later diagnosed with an autism spectrum disorder.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究發表在九月份的《兒科》雜誌上面。

sentences.english: She put the medicine on the top shelf beyond the reach of her son .
sentences.chinese: 她把藥放在了兒子夠不着的最上面的架子上。

sentences.english: Jiao body red drapery Cui lid, up put Long Feng to show lucky omen, four the angles hang silk Sui.
sentences.chinese: 轎身紅幔翠蓋，上面插龍鳳呈祥，四角掛着絲穗。
不扣衣領最上面的鈕釦。

sentences.english: Of course, such data did not appear in “This is Japan”.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這些數據並沒有在《這就是日本》上面登載。

sentences.english: And then that one's got an 18 on it, so I had it for like two years now.
sentences.chinese: 然後那個上面有一個數字18，所以我擁有它兩年了。

sentences.english: The cartoon above is one of my personal favourites.
sentences.chinese: 上面的漫畫是我最喜歡的一個。

sentences.english: Your guide hand is placed above the belay device friction brake.
sentences.chinese: 您的導向手應放在繩栓摩擦制動裝備上面。

sentences.english: So that was a more recent one.
sentences.chinese: 上面所說的是近年來遇到的挑戰。

sentences.english: A shirt that says "Hawaii is beautiful".
sentences.chinese: 一種上面印着“夏威夷真美麗”的襯衫。

sentences.english: Nobody has paid a visit to that grave for a long time, so it is covered in weeds.
sentences.chinese: 那座墳丘因爲好久沒人祭掃，上面長滿了野草。

sentences.english: The lines remain over the trailing edges during the entire rotation.
sentences.chinese: 線在整個平轉過程中保持在風箏邊沿的上面。

sentences.english: They raised the pirate flag, with its picture of a skull and crossed bones.
sentences.chinese: 他們升起海盜旗，上面畫着骷髏頭和交叉的兩把刀。

sentences.english: Many of the channel impairments described above can be mitigated on-chip using equalization.
sentences.chinese: 上面提到的信道損害可以在芯片上用均等化來減輕。

sentences.english: And there's something on that grass that cures that blood disease.
sentences.chinese: 草葉子上面的什麼東西就把她的血液病給治好了。

sentences.english: This one was heart-shaped all satiny red with a pink bow on top.
sentences.chinese: 就像一隻粉紅色的蝴蝶停在一朵深紅的玫瑰上面。

definition: the top/above/overhead/upwards/the top margin/above-mentioned/those higher up
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
Shangdu, also known as Xanadu, summer capital of the Yuan Dynasty (1279-1368)
left/the left side/to the left of
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
